author: Jacob Dressler
description:
The Marvel Cinematic Universe is built on the reoccurring characters and storylines that make it feel like a consistent and thoroughly connected world. As such, fans are always excited to see their fan-favorite characters make a return. Unfortunately, it’s been revealed that one beloved Marvel actor actually turned down returning to the MCU over an [...]

The post Beloved Marvel Actor Turns Down MCU Return Over Lower Salary Offer appeared first on ScreenGeek.
title: Beloved Marvel Actor Turns Down MCU Return Over Lower Salary Offer
